data.eml:eml: Palaearctic Abaristophora (Diptera: Phoridae): First female of A. arctophila Schmitz, 1927 and a new species from N. W. Russia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pape, Thomas, Ulefors, Sven-Olof, Disney, R. Henry L. (2013): Palaearctic Abaristophora (Diptera: Phoridae): First female of A. arctophila Schmitz, 1927 and a new species from N. W. Russia. Zootaxa 3681 (3): 249-256, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3681.3.4
